knimeNode.name: GolgiP Accessor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides access to the GolgiP web server using klunky CGI-access

intro.p: Provides access to the GolgiP server, http://csbl1.bmb.uga.edu/GolgiP/ from within KNIME, to provide subcellular localisation clues for possible Golgi-related proteins within the cell. Requires a column of protein sequences to predict on. GolgiP is published work:

Bioinformatics. 2010 October 1; 26(19): 2464â€“2465. Published online 2010 August 23. doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btq446
GolgiP: prediction of Golgi-resident proteins in plants Wen-Chi Chou Yanbin Yin and Ying Xu* Associate Editor: Burkhard Rost Received May 12, 2010; Revised July 16, 2010; Accepted July 31, 2010.
WARNING: the node gets data over the Internet and this makes your search data public - be careful with the data you give to this node.
WARNING: this node uses screen scraping (actually web scraping) to obtain the data. If the GolgiP website is changed, the node might produce incorrect results. Caveat emptor!

ports.inPort: One column is used to provide the protein sequences to predict on
ports.outPort: For each sequence, the golgi localisation is predicted as computed by the remote server. This node does not add a graphical track to the sequence data
Any predicted conserved domains for the input sequences are also reported
